text: Homer Ulrich was an American musicologist born in Chicago, Illinois. In 1948, he published a book titled "Chamber Music: The Growth and Practice of an Intimate Art". He also served as a professor at the Department of Music at The University of Maryland in the early 1950s. == References == Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:20th-century American scientists Category:American musicologists Category:University System of Maryland faculty Category:20th-century scholars Category:American academics Category:20th-century American writers Category:20th-century American male writers Category:People from Chicago
title: Homer Ulrich
